data.text: @sufw Reminds me of a Red Dwarf episode. Crew enter a spaceship. One of them checks the readout for presence of a virus. Announces "We are all going to ....live"
@sufw W00t! Congratulations on both fronts… no Covid *and* a return to travel 👏👏👏. Exciting to see!

@michaelneale We took some precautions: daily lateral flow tests for all attendees with result sharing on WhatsApp, masks required unless eating, two different models of N95 masks provided, etc. https://t.co/Rx3gtDnvtD
@steinermatt Yep, very proud of our colleagues. The new normal of these events included daily lateral flow tests and sharing results on WhatsApp for everyone’s assurance. https://t.co/zWK4dnXF3N
@sufw Speaks volumes about the organization and discipline of all involved!
